description: Tests OAuth2 authentication and CalDAV operations with Google Calendar

test_cases.name: List Google Calendars
test_cases.context: Testing if OAuth2 authentication works and can discover Google calendars via CalDAV

test_cases.name: List Events from Primary Calendar
test_cases.user_query: What events do I have this week?
test_cases.context: Testing event retrieval from Google Calendar with OAuth2

test_cases.name: Create Event in Google Calendar
test_cases.user_query: Create a test meeting tomorrow at 2pm titled 'OAuth2 Test Meeting'
test_cases.context: Testing event creation in Google Calendar via OAuth2

test_cases.name: Search for Specific Event
test_cases.user_query: Find all meetings with 'OAuth2' in the title
test_cases.context: Testing event search with filter in Google Calendar

test_cases.name: Update Event Summary
test_cases.user_query: Change the title of my OAuth2 Test Meeting to 'OAuth2 Integration Complete'
test_cases.context: Testing event update in Google Calendar
test_cases.common_mistake: LLM might try to use update_event_raw instead of update_event

test_cases.name: Delete Test Event
test_cases.user_query: Delete the OAuth2 Integration Complete meeting
test_cases.context: Testing event deletion in Google Calendar

test_cases.name: List Events with Time Range
test_cases.user_query: Show me all events in my work calendar next week
test_cases.context: Testing calendar query with time range filter

test_cases.name: Create Event with Location
test_cases.user_query: Schedule a team meeting next Monday at 10am in the Berlin Office
test_cases.context: Testing event creation with location field

test_cases.name: Multiple Calendars Discovery
test_cases.user_query: How many calendars do I have access to?
test_cases.context: Verify OAuth2 discovers all 5 Google calendars (Primary + 4 others)

test_cases.name: Query Specific Calendar by Name
test_cases.user_query: Show me events from my Arbeit calendar
test_cases.context: Testing if LLM can identify calendar by name and query it
test_cases.common_mistake: LLM might not specify calendar_url and query all calendars
